Key Match Events: After 120 minutes of drama, and then 18 penalty kicks, D.R. Congo have managed to make it through to the AFCON quarter-finals, with Egypt goalkeeper Gabaski missing the all-important penalty.
Pre-Game Insights: In 25 minutes, Liverpool are in action for the first time since the shock announcement that manager Jurgen Klopp would be leaving at the end of the season. The Reds host Norwich in the FA Cup.
In around 25 minutes, Australia take on Indonesia in the first knockout match of this year's Asian Cup. Can Indonesia pull off a massive upset?
In 20 minutes, Lille will be looking to climb into the top four in Ligue 1 with a win when they face Montpellier.
Post-Match Reflections: D.R. Congo are into the quarters

Despite the Jurgen Klopp news dominating the footballing world, things continue to move at a blistering pace, and after a weekend of action in Europe's big leagues, it won't be long before it becomes yesterday's news.
Miscellaneous Highlights: D.R. Congo have sent Egypt home after a dramatic clash, with the match going to extra time and 18 penalty kicks.
Atletico Madrid beat Valencia 2-0 to leapfrog Barcelona into third in LaLiga.
